nodes.text: Gelan Yees was a Sabat who served in the Cloud-Riders under the command of Enfys Nest. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Yees participated in a skirmish with Crimson Dawn on Savareen.
Gelan Yees was portrayed by Dilu Miah in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was identified later that year by by the Star Wars: Card Trader app.
